data.text: Botae bi a edi mu akanyan me koma
Wudi mu koraa wɔ mmarima mu
Fa wʼafoa bɔ wo nkyɛn mu, okokuroko;
Fa wo kɛseyɛ mu kɔ wʼanim nkonimdi so
Ma wo bɛmma nnamnam no nhwirew ɔhene atamfo koma mu;
Ao Onyankopɔn, wʼahengua no bɛtena hɔ daa daa;
Kurobow, pɛprɛ ne bɛwewonua hua agye wo batakari mu nyinaa;
Ahemfo mmabea ka wo mmea atitiriw ho;
Ɔbabea tie, dwene ho, na yɛ osetie;
Ɔhene babea a ɔwɔ ne pia mu no yɛ onuonyamfo
Ɔhyɛ ntade a wɔadi mu adwinni na wɔde no kɔma ɔhene;
Wɔde ahosɛpɛw ne anigye kɔ mu;
Wo mmabarima besi wʼagyanom anan mu
Mɛma wɔakae wo wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu;
